name: Winter Café
description:
This game is not complete!!! 

This game is about a cozy winter café where people of different backgrounds meet. 

-----------------------------------

This is a project I came up with about 2 years ago, but then I had a baby so I haven't had the time to continue, so I took the chance to join https://itch.io/jam/winter-vn-jam-2022 to continue working with it. It's still not complete, but I will try to continue next year. 

Happy new year!

-----------------------

Credits:

Story, art and code: Morgis
